mapper.insert: insert into advertise (project, title, content, format, width, height, price, profit, state) values (#{projectId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{format}, #{width}, #{height}, #{price}, #{profit},#{status,typeHandler=AdvertiseStatusTypeHandler})
mapper.select:
select
from advertise where id > #{minId} and state = #{status,typeHandler=AdvertiseStatusTypeHandler} order by id limit 30
